posts.post_content:
Need just a handful of T207 catchers now!

With Grover Cleveland Hartley on the way, I just need a few more T207 catchers to complete my run in the T207 set.

Looking for creaseless examples of:

Red Kuhn, White Sox
Paddy Livingston (A)
Irv Lewis (with or without emblem.)

Thanks,

Patrick
